title: Short Stuff: Andrew Jackson's Inauguration | STUFF YOU SHOULD KNOW

I'll even say that as a Georgia fan and

this stuff had evidently happened. She
was tardy to the party. Tardy to the

she was a good example of how the

the they felt like they owned DC and

because Andrew Jackson had won the
